posts.message:
Hello,
I am Mostafa, 15 Years Old, I learned everything about Windows, Microsoft and Office Applications. I also learned HTML5, CSS3, Javascript and jQuery.

I am learning C#, what is your recommendations for me, because I am still young and I would love to hear advises from other experienced geeks!

Thanks in Advance!

Has anyone come across a plugin which can add a feature in Apple Mail to turn emails into task or follow ups? Wrike.com used to have one, but no longer available, and then there is this http://www.mailpilot.co but I don't want to change to a whole new mail app.. I just want to tag or flag and add a follow up to an email :(
posts.caption: mailpilot.co
posts.description: Quickly manage and productively organize your Inbox with Mail Pilot for Mac, iPhone + iPad | Intuitive email with a simple, task-oriented approach.
